title: Council Decision of 1 December 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 1 December 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (98/C 387/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training for the period from 29 June 1998 to 28 June 2001.
A. >TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 December 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. EDLINGER
(1) OJ L 167, 30.6.1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ C 222, 16.7.1998, p. 3.
